document_data.name: ''Proof Against Transmutation''
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Proof against transmutation''''' was a [[armor quality|quality]] that could be applied to magical [[armor]].

It made its wearer immune to shape-changing [[transmutation]] effects such as [[disintegration]], [[petrification]], or [[polymorph]]ing.

Bestowing it required ''[[spell immunity]]''.
